name: Set.Iic.coe_inf
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
a : α
inst✝ : SemilatticeInf α
x y : ↑(Set.Iic a)
⊢ Eq (↑(Min.min x y)) (Min.min ↑x ↑y)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
protected lemma coe_inf [SemilatticeInf α] {x y : Iic a} :
    (↑(x ⊓ y) : α) = (x : α) ⊓ (y : α) :=
  rfl

name: Set.Iic.coe_sup
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
a : α
inst✝ : SemilatticeSup α
x y : ↑(Set.Iic a)
⊢ Eq (↑(Max.max x y)) (Max.max ↑x ↑y)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
protected lemma coe_sup [SemilatticeSup α] {x y : Iic a} :
    (↑(x ⊔ y) : α) = (x : α) ⊔ (y : α) :=
  rfl

name: Set.Iic.coe_top
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
a : α
inst✝ : Preorder α
⊢ Eq (↑Top.top) a
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_top [Preorder α] : (⊤ : Iic a) = a :=
  rfl

name: Set.Iic.eq_top_iff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
a : α
inst✝ : Preorder α
x : ↑(Set.Iic a)
⊢ Iff (Eq x Top.top) (Eq (↑x) a)
decl:
protected lemma eq_top_iff [Preorder α] {x : Iic a} :
    x = ⊤ ↔ (x : α) = a := by
  simp [Subtype.ext_iff]

name: Set.Iic.coe_bot
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
a : α
inst✝¹ : Preorder α
inst✝ : OrderBot α
⊢ Eq (↑Bot.bot) Bot.bot
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_bot [Preorder α] [OrderBot α] : (⊥ : Iic a) = (⊥ : α) :=
  rfl

name: Set.Iic.disjoint_iff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
a : α
inst✝¹ : SemilatticeInf α
inst✝ : OrderBot α
x y : ↑(Set.Iic a)
⊢ Iff (Disjoint x y) (Disjoint ↑x ↑y)
decl:
protected lemma disjoint_iff [SemilatticeInf α] [OrderBot α] {x y : Iic a} :
    Disjoint x y ↔ Disjoint (x : α) (y : α) := by
  simp [_root_.disjoint_iff, Subtype.ext_iff]

name: Set.Iic.codisjoint_iff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
a : α
inst✝ : SemilatticeSup α
x y : ↑(Set.Iic a)
⊢ Iff (Codisjoint x y) (Eq (Max.max ↑x ↑y) a)
decl:
protected lemma codisjoint_iff [SemilatticeSup α] {x y : Iic a} :
    Codisjoint x y ↔ (x : α) ⊔ (y : α) = a := by
  simpa only [_root_.codisjoint_iff] using Iic.eq_top_iff

name: Set.Iic.isCompl_iff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
a : α
inst✝¹ : Lattice α
inst✝ : BoundedOrder α
x y : ↑(Set.Iic a)
⊢ Iff (IsCompl x y) (And (Disjoint ↑x ↑y) (Eq (Max.max ↑x ↑y) a))
decl:
protected lemma isCompl_iff [Lattice α] [BoundedOrder α] {x y : Iic a} :
    IsCompl x y ↔ Disjoint (x : α) (y : α) ∧ (x : α) ⊔ (y : α) = a := by
  rw [_root_.isCompl_iff, Iic.disjoint_iff, Iic.codisjoint_iff]

name: Set.Iic.complementedLattice_iff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
a : α
inst✝¹ : Lattice α
inst✝ : BoundedOrder α
⊢ Iff (ComplementedLattice ↑(Set.Iic a)) (∀ (b : α), LE.le b a → Exists fun c => And (LE.le c a) (And (Eq (Min.min b c) Bot.bot) (Eq (Max.max b c) a)))
decl:
protected lemma complementedLattice_iff [Lattice α] [BoundedOrder α] :
    ComplementedLattice (Iic a) ↔ ∀ b, b ≤ a → ∃ c ≤ a, b ⊓ c = ⊥ ∧ b ⊔ c = a := by
  refine ⟨fun h b hb ↦ ?_, fun h ↦ ⟨fun ⟨x, hx⟩ ↦ ?_⟩⟩
  · obtain ⟨⟨c, hc₁⟩, hc⟩ := exists_isCompl (⟨b, hb⟩ : Iic a)
    obtain ⟨hc₂, hc₃⟩ := Set.Iic.isCompl_iff.mp hc
    exact ⟨c, hc₁, disjoint_iff.mp hc₂, hc₃⟩
  · simp_rw [Set.Iic.isCompl_iff]
    obtain ⟨c, hc₁, hc₂, hc₃⟩ := h x hx
    exact ⟨⟨c, hc₁⟩, disjoint_iff.mpr hc₂, hc₃⟩

name: Set.Ici.coe_bot
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : Preorder α
a : α
⊢ Eq (↑Bot.bot) a
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_bot [Preorder α] {a : α} : ↑(⊥ : Ici a) = a :=
  rfl

name: Set.Ici.coe_top
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Preorder α
inst✝ : OrderTop α
a : α
⊢ Eq (↑Top.top) Top.top
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_top [Preorder α] [OrderTop α] {a : α} : ↑(⊤ : Ici a) = (⊤ : α) :=
  rfl

name: Set.Icc.coe_bot
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
a b : α
inst✝¹ : Preorder α
inst✝ : Fact (LE.le a b)
⊢ Eq (↑Bot.bot) a
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_bot : ↑(⊥ : Icc a b) = a := rfl

name: Set.Icc.coe_top
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
a b : α
inst✝¹ : Preorder α
inst✝ : Fact (LE.le a b)
⊢ Eq (↑Top.top) b
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_top : ↑(⊤ : Icc a b) = b := rfl
